results.definition: a presentation to the mind in the form of an idea or image
the state of serving as an official and authorized delegate or agent
a body of legislators that serve in behalf of some constituency
examples: a Congressional vacancy occurred in the representation from California

results.definition: a creation that is a visual or tangible rendering of someone or something
a factual statement made by one party in order to induce another party to enter into a contract
examples: the sales contract contains several representations by the vendor

results.definition: an activity that stands as an equivalent of something or results in an equivalent
a statement of facts and reasons made in appealing or protesting
examples: certain representations were made concerning police brutality

results.definition: the act of representing; standing in for someone or some group and speaking with authority in their behalf
the right of being represented by delegates who have a voice in some legislative body
